Entries.ExtraDialogue_LostItemQuest_DefaultThank: Oh... thank you, @. That brightens things up a little for me.

Entries.Phone_Robin_Workout: Hey, it's Robin. I'll, umm... I'm at aerobics class. Need to clear my head. Goodbye. *beep*
Entries.Phone_Robin_Working_OneDay: Hey, it's Robin. I'll be out of the house until tomorrow finishing up a project. I'll be fine. I lo... nevermind. *beep*
Entries.Phone_Robin_Working: Hey, it's Robin. I'll be busy for the next few days working on a project. Nothing to worry about de... nevermind. *beep*
Entries.Phone_Robin_Festival: Hey, it's Robin. I'm taking the day off today. It'll be okay. *beep*
Entries.Phone_Robin_Open_Rare: Hello? Oh, hey... @. *BANG*... What...? (Muffled Voice: The door, it just... swung open on its own.)... Sorry. We're open until 5pm today. *click* $s
Entries.Phone_Robin_Closed: Hey, it's Robin. My business hours are from 9AM to 5PM. We can't be late. *beep*

Entries.ScienceHouse_RobinAbsent:
Closed for the day... I'm clearing my head.

-Robin
Entries.ScienceHouse_MoneyBox: Gone for today. We're working on the honor system.^     -Robin
Entries.ScienceHouse_Carpenter_CommunityUpgrade1: ...Huh? You want to build Pam a house? That's... really nice of you.^I'll need 950 wood and 500,000g...
Entries.ScienceHouse_Carpenter_CommunityUpgrade2: ...Huh? You'd like me to add a few shortcuts around the valley? I guess I could do that.^I'll need 300,000g...

Entries.ScienceHouse_Carpenter_CommunityUpgrade1: ...Huh? You want to upgrade the old trailer? That's... really nice of you.^I'll just need 950 wood and 500,000g...

Entries.ResourceCollectionQuest.cs.13674: Robin, here. I need {0} pieces of {1} for a project. They need to be fresh... so please gather them today. Thanks.
Entries.ResourceCollectionQuest.cs.13677: Oh, you got the {0} I asked for...
Entries.ResourceCollectionQuest.cs.13682: Thanks for helping me... I just have to keep on moving, I guess.$n
